title: PLZ HELP
body:
{{champion:266}} Ok i just got league for the MAC and iv been playing it for a long time, when i log in to the screen where you can go to the shop or you can click ''Play". when i look t the bottom of the screen where the border is it said "Logging onto chat service..." and it stays like that no matter how long i leave it, and its a BIG pain cos i can't type in champ select and i can't see or chat to my mates, but i can type once I'm in a game

From UnbeatableLuck

replies.body:
>Ok i just got league for the MAC and iv been playing it for a long time

Wait, so you only recently got the game but you've been playing it for ages? And what's a "long time" anyway? Oxymorons op.

What are your network settings like? Have you changed them at all?
i used to play league on windows and iv been playing league for like 2-3 years and i play on a mac book pro

Ah, that makes sense. That wording though :P

>What are your network settings like? Have you changed them at all?
